title: Create a New Customer Quote
description: A sales representative needs to create a quote for a potential new customer for a standard product.

tasks.description: Identify the product and quantity the customer is interested in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the correct product SKU and enters the quantity.

tasks.description: Retrieve the standard list price for the product and apply a standard new customer discount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the price and applies the correct discount.

tasks.description: Generate a formal quote document with the final price, terms, and validity date, and email it to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the quote PDF and sends it to the customer.
